response.overview: Montevideo, See You! is a Serbian TV series from 2014. It is the final continuation of the series Montevideo, God Bless You!, which was the directorial debut of Serbian actor Dragan Bjelogrlić, based on a screenplay by Ranko Božić and Dimitrije Vojnov. The screenplay was adapted from the book of the same name by sports journalist Vladimir Stanković, which tells the story of the great success of the Kingdom of Yugoslavia’s national football team (at that time composed of players from Serbia) at the 1930 FIFA World Cup in Uruguay.  The third season of the series, titled Montevideo, See You!, follows the continuation of the story, focusing on the World Cup in Uruguay, and consists of 10 episodes
response.title: Montevideo, vidimo se!
